name: SMARAGDUS
description:
Smaragdine, “emerald-green in color,” comes via Latin Smaragdus from Ancient Greek smáragdos, “emerald”.

In Smaragdus, you play as a hero masked with the color of emerald-green. However, monster decided to invade the city, Rūbrīca, that you are living in. Fight off them! Beware, enemies get stronger and stronger overtime but you only have one health bar, and one shot to defend your city. How to Play?

Every round you meet a whole new monster with various health and damage. You need kill it in order to progress.

  • attack - 80% to deal damage to enemies
  • defence - if the opponent successfully dealt damage, then this will block 50% of the damage
  • heal - Heal 1 Health
  • heavy attack - 50% to deal +100% (2x) more damage
